Mark__06.5__He could not: : Not for want of power, but because he would not work miracles in favour of obstinate and incredulous people, who were unworthy of such favours.
Mark__06.20__And kept him: : That is, from the designs of Herodias; and for fear of the people, would not put him to death, though she sought it; and through her daughter she effected her wish.
